name: media-on-demand-webapp
description: A web app that allows tenants register and configure their media-on-demand presets.
author: LongLH <d@dapps.me>

scripts.dev:client:watch: cd client/internals && nodemon dev-server --watch dev-server --watch webpack --exec babel-node
scripts.dev:server:run: cd server && nodemon app/index.js --watch app --watch internals --exec babel-node --CONFIG=internals/config.dev.js
scripts.prod:server:build: cd server && babel app/index.js -o prod.js && cd ..
